short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes display of plain-text mails and compose window to a monospace font.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin sets the font for the display of text-only emails to a monospace font. It also modifies the compose window. Default text for plain-text emails is also monospace, and it limits the (displayed) line-length to 72 characters.
